summary: Wiegekarten (Weighing Cards) module testing completed successfully. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: Table view with double-click to detail panel, sidebar navigation, weight display (Brutto/Tara/Netto), 'Neue Wiegekarte' dialog with form validation.
critical_code_review_comments: Weight calculation logic correct: Wareneingang (Wägung1=Brutto, Wägung2=Tara), Warenausgang (Wägung1=Tara, Wägung2=Brutto)
Storno prevents further edits and weighings - business logic enforced
Delete only allowed for cards without weighings - correct constraint
Waage/lesen endpoint returns MOCKED demo data (random 5000-35000 kg) - production would use Systec IT 4000 socket connection
seed_data_creation: Test wiegekarten created with TEST- prefix in kennzeichen for testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Wiegekarten module fully functional. Backend endpoints all working. Frontend has table view with double-click to detail panel (slide-in from right), sidebar navigation (Stammdaten, Fahrzeug, Artikel/Material, Wägung, Mengen/Stück, Bemerkungen), weight display (Brutto/Tara/Netto). 'Neue Wiegekarte' dialog creates new cards. Waage/lesen is MOCKED with demo data.

POST /api/wiegekarten.notes: Create Wareneingang/Warenausgang, validation error for missing kennzeichen

POST /api/wiegekarten/{id}/waegung/{nr}.notes: Wägung 1, Wägung 2, manual weighing, netto calculation

DELETE /api/wiegekarten/{id}.notes: Delete without weighings, fails with weighings

POST /api/waage/lesen.notes: Demo mode returns random weight 5000-35000 kg

frontend_ui.wiegekarten_page: WORKING - Table with columns Nr., Status, Richtung, Kennzeichen, Adresse, Netto, Datum
frontend_ui.double_click_detail: WORKING - Opens slide-in detail panel from right
frontend_ui.detail_panel_header: WORKING - Shows WK-Nr, status badge, direction
frontend_ui.sidebar_navigation: WORKING - 6 sections: Stammdaten, Fahrzeug, Artikel/Material, Wägung, Mengen/Stück, Bemerkungen
frontend_ui.neue_wiegekarte_dialog: WORKING - Form with Typ, Richtung, Kennzeichen, Anhänger, Adresse, Artikel/Sorte

mocked_apis.POST /api/waage/lesen: Demo mode - returns random weight between 5000-35000 kg. In production would use Systec IT 4000 socket connection

dependency_fix_applied: @radix-ui/react-scroll-area was missing, installed via yarn add
